A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: How in God's name did this film get made? How in God's name did no one at Disney see the massive plot holes all over the script? I would literally need 1\,000 pages to write out every problem with this film. I wanted to walk out after an hour. 2 audience members in a room full of 150 hardcore fanboys clapped at the finish. 2. Horrific beyond my wildest dreams. Star Wars is beyond repair now. How did this happen???????
